attributes.additional_details: I am creating this e-petition to bring to the attention of people my feelings on a great man. Not just what hes done as a footballer or as a manager but as a person. His  amazing charity work along with his wife and also the way in which he has supported all the families affected Hillsborough. The way he handled himself in the aftermath of the disaster and the way in which he conducted himself attending the funerals etc was nothing short of Knightly hood.{lease sign this petition, I feel this great man duky deserves to be knighted.
